import React,{useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const Home = props => { const[cart, setCart]=useState([]); const PAGE_PRODUCTS="products"; const PAGE_CART="cart"; const[page, setPage]=useState(PAGE_PRODUCTS); const navigateTo=(nextpage)=>{ setPage(nextpage); } const addToCart=(id)=>{ let newCart=[...cart]; let check=cart.find(ga=> ga.id === id ) if(check){ check.quantity++; } else{ check ={ ...id, quantity:1, }; newCart.push(check); } setCart(newCart); } const reMove=(id)=>{ setCart( cart.filter(pro=>{ return pro.id != id; }) ) } const renderProducts=()=>( <>
{/* product list item start */} {/* product item list end */} { props.products.map(value=>{ return (
{/* product grid item start */}
{value.name}
${value.price} ${value.sale_price}
)})}
); const renderCart=()=>( <>
{/* Cart Table Area */}

) } Home.propTypes = { } export default Home
